We show that Bacteroides LPS is structurally distinct from E. coli LPS and inhibits innate immune signaling and endotoxin tolerance; furthermore, unlike LPS from E. coli, B. dorei LPS does not decrease incidence of autoimmune diabetes in non - obese diabetic mice.

column1: Alpha diversity measures of the samples were averaged across the 100 bootstrapped datasets at 1, 000 reads per sample, and compared among the four menstrual phases ( menstrual, follicular, periovulatory, and luteal) by using a linear nested mixed - effects model for Shannon diversity and a Poisson nested mixed - effects model for Chao1 nested within subject.
